description: The PAT_COB_INFO_EFF_STATUS table contains a list of Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage effective period statuses for a COB coverage to which a member belongs.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: COB_COVERED_THROUGH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered through status for this COB coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Current Employment


Retirement


COBRA / Continuation of Benefits
